meanings.definition: A small, flat surface on a computer or laptop that is used to move the cursor and perform functions by touching or swiping with a finger.
meanings.sent1: I gently tapped the touchpad to scroll through the webpage.
meanings.sent2: The touchpad on my laptop stopped working, so I had to use a mouse instead.
meanings.sent3: The touchpad decided to play hide and seek, moving the cursor on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her touchpad was like a magic carpet, guiding her through the digital world effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The touchpad, a tiny wizard under my fingertips, controlled the computer with precision.

meanings.definition: The touch-sensitive area on a smartphone or tablet that allows for navigation and control of the device.
meanings.sent1: He swiped his finger across the touchpad to unlock the phone.
meanings.sent2: The touchpad on my tablet is very responsive to my gestures.
meanings.sent3: The touchpad on the smartphone seemed to have a mind of its own, opening apps randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her tablet's touchpad was a gateway to a world of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch on the touchpad, the tablet came to life, ready to be explored.
